auth.signInMessage: Sign in to access the Nexus AI platform.
auth.startJourney: Start your contribution journey with Nexus AI.
auth.enterEmailMessage: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.

project.title: Project Title
project.noProjectsMessage: We refresh the queue regularly. Check back soon or make sure your profile details are up to date.

admin.reviewSubmissions: Review submissions that require human evaluation after AI quality check.

profile.deleteAccountWarning: Permanently delete your account and all associated data.
profile.bioPlaceholder: Describe your relevant skills and expertise...
profile.paymentPlaceholder: Your PayPal email or phone number

application.applicationDescription: Please complete the following assessment and provide your basic information to finalize your application. Your answer accuracy and language skills will be evaluated.
application.bioDescription: Please mention your academic and professional experience related to data annotation and AI fields.
application.bioPlaceholder: Example: 3 years of Python experience, data analysis using Pandas, and native-level English proficiency.
application.technicalTask: Task: Classify the sentiment and intent in the following response text. Your answer must be one word for sentiment and one word for intent, separated by (/). Example: [negative/inquiry].
application.applicationUnderReviewMessage: Thank you for your submission. Our team is currently reviewing your application and test results. You will be notified once a decision has been made.
application.applicationRejectedMessage: Unfortunately, your application did not meet the current requirements. You may try again at a later time.
application.pleaseEnterTestAnswer: Please enter your technical test answer.

wallet.walletDescription: Track your approved balance, monitor reviews in progress, and request payouts with confidence.
wallet.availableBalanceDescription: Funds already approved by the team. Request a payout whenever you're ready.
wallet.transactionHistoryDescription: A chronological log of requests and approvals for your records.
wallet.noTransactions: No transactions available yet. Complete tasks or request a payout to see activity here.
wallet.noApprovedEarnings: You have no approved earnings to withdraw.

analytics.analyticsDescription: Track your productivity, earnings, and task completion status at a glance.
analytics.totalEarningsDescription: Your cumulative income from all approved task submissions.
analytics.approvedTasksDescription: The number of tasks you've completed that have been reviewed and accepted.
analytics.pendingReviewDescription: Tasks currently awaiting admin review and approval.

dashboard.dashboardDescription: Curated opportunities tailored for you. Dive into a project to review the full brief and start contributing.
